name: Shade Shift
description:
Shift between the shades to navigate your way through through 11 unique platforming puzzles filled with both dexterity and strategy challenges. Each level consists of two shades of maps--both are necessary to complete each level, but only one can be visible at a time. Balance between thinking on your feet and planning ahead to reach the goal!

Stay tuned for updates and more levels in the future!

Controls: 

  • WASD/arrow keys for movement
  • L/R shift or q for shifting colors

Contributors: 

  • Level design: celciko, rhizostomae, jennyj, taro-cakes, ArmyBox1
  • Programming: celciko, rhizostomae, jennyj, taro-cakes, ArmyBox1
  • Music: Mushrooms by Komiku (royalty-free music)
